page.title: 07Southern Nazeing
page.content: There are two main types of land use in the areea, agriculture and gravel extractions. Most of the arable farming is carried out in the S & SE. Main type of crops being grown are wheat and barley. Some farms such as Paynes Farm is the type commonly found in the Lee Valley that produces market garden crops ie tomatoes, cucumbers, lettuce and peppers whilst some of the nurseries are concerned with growing pot plants for indoor use and border plants for gardens. Of the latter type of farm a common feature is the greenhouse where growing conditions can be regulated by the farmer. On these nurseries the farmers have acquired the expertise of bringing in the crop/flower to fruition at the appropriate time of year, and in a growing number of cases are even able to produce crops 'out of season'.
